projects.title: Interactive Form
projects.description: Form with dynamic validation to enhance engagement, interactivity, and ease.

projects.title: OOP Game Show App
projects.description: Word guessing game with an onscreen keybard and has functionability with your computer keyboard. Phrases are randomly selected from a provided list.

projects.title: Public API Requests
projects.description: An app for a ficitonal company called Awesome Startup. Using the Random User Generator API, I've requested a list of 12 "employees" and displayed them. Employees will use this app as a way to share contact information with each other.

projects.title: React Gallery App
projects.description: An image gallery app with the style of a modern single page application to keep it fast, modular, and in sync with current web development trends.

projects.title: SQL Library Manager
projects.description: A library manager to keep track of a collection of books.

projects.title: Full Stack App with React and a REST API
projects.description: A full stack application for users to administer a school database containing information about courses: users can interact with the database by retrieving a list of courses, viewing detail for a specific course, as well as creating, updating and deleting courses.
